Diabetes.description: Diabetes status. 0 = no diabetes, 1 = prediabetes, 2 = diabetes

HighBP.description: High blood pressure. 0 = no high BP, 1 = high BP

HighChol.description: High cholesterol. 0 = no high cholesterol, 1 = high cholesterol

CholCheck.description: Cholesterol check in the past 5 years. 0 = no, 1 = yes

Smoker.description: Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes? 0 = no, 1 = yes

Stroke.description: Ever told you had a stroke. 0 = no, 1 = yes

HeartAttack.description: Coronary heart disease or myocardial infarction. 0 = no, 1 = yes

PhysActivity.description: Physical activity in past 30 days (excluding job). 0 = no, 1 = yes

Fruits.description: Consume fruit 1+ times per day. 0 = no, 1 = yes

Veggies.description: Consume vegetables 1+ times per day. 0 = no, 1 = yes

HealthCare.description: Has any health care coverage. 0 = no, 1 = yes

Unaffordable_care.description: Needed to see a doctor but could not due to cost in past 12 months. 0 = no, 1 = yes

GeneralHealth.description: Self-rated general health. 1 = excellent, 2 = very good, 3 = good, 4 = fair, 5 = poor

MentalHealth.description: Number of days in past 30 days mental health was not good (1–30)

PhysicalHealth.description: Number of days in past 30 days physical health was not good (1–30)

DiffWalk.description: Difficulty walking or climbing stairs. 0 = no, 1 = yes

map.1: Never attended school or only kindergarten
map.5: College 1-3 years (Some college or technical school)

Education.description: Education level coded 1–6: 1 = no school/kindergarten only, 2 = elementary (grades 1–8), 3 = some high school (grades 9–11), 4 = high school graduate (GED or grade 12), 5 = some college (1–3 years), 6 = college graduate (4 or more years).
